title: Cancel my subscription
content:
Included in:
Grammarly Pro and Business plans
Managed by:
Admins
Go to the
Subscription
page.
Scroll down to the bottom of the page and c
lick
Cancel Subscription
.
Click
Yes, continue
.
Choose a reason for cancellation and click
Cancel Subscription
.
Cancelling a subscription stops its automatic renewal, but you will still have access to all paid features for the rest of your current subscription period.
